meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to 1000 grams.
meanings.sent1: She weighed the apples in kilograms.
meanings.sent3: Carrying 100 kilograms of feathers would be easier than carrying 100 kilograms of bricks.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him weighed more than a thousand kilograms of gold.
meanings.sent5: The elephant's weight was measured in kilograms, surprising everyone with its mass.

meanings.definition: The basic unit of mass in the International System of Units (SI).
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the liquid in kilograms.
meanings.sent2: One kilogram is equal to 1000 grams.
meanings.sent3: If you eat a kilogram of candy, you might turn into a candy bar!
meanings.sent4: His words carried the weight of a thousand kilograms, impacting everyone who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The importance of the mission was as heavy as a kilogram of lead, pressing on their minds.
